name: Low Disk Space (Blawnode, BGdevRage)
description:
A tiny game for the Game Dev Community Discord Jam (SixGames).

Made by me (Blawnode), and CrealStudio

Instructions:

Your computer has been infected by a self-duplicating virus,

and your storage space is running low!

Obliterate all of the viruses to win.

Once there's too many viruses, your computer crashes and you lose.

The viruses will also try to attack your system!

Keys:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim, left click to shoot

Space to lock a folder (Only when close enough to a folder)
